song.title: Bad Girls Need Love Too
song.info: You know, bad girls need love too. Come over here. Gimme your hand. Ooh, you *are* a bad boy, aren't you? Mmm! What's your name? What's your fantasy? You're gonna have to tell me what to do. You're gonna have to show me what to do. I'm a very kinky girl. I-I'm a very kinky girl. Should I get on all fours? Should I get on my knees? Do you like it hard? Do you like it fast? Or do you like it slow, and soft? Mmm. I've never done this before. I've been very good. I've been *such* a good girl. Where's my reward? Do I get a treat now? Oh, wow! That's a really big piece of hardware. May I please lick it? Oh my God, you *are* the best. I wanna be on top. I wanna feel your body. I wanna do this all night. I'm a very kinky girl. I-I'm a very kinky girl. I've been a bad girl. Ooh. I've been very bad. You can put it anywhere you want. Higher, higher, there, there, uh! Ouch, you got it in my eye! We may need to grab a towel. Oops! Okay... you're a kinky one, aren't you? Mmm. Come on, you dirty boy, let's get you into the shower.
